name: Project Auto-Complete
description:
Daily cron task to mark projects as "Completed" aftr a specified number of days since the date of their last logged event.
See documentation for how to perform Control Centre tests.

crons.cron_description: Automatically mark projects as "Complete" once the specified number of days has elapsed since the last logged event.

system-settings.name: Inactivity threshold days (integer): mark project "Complete" this many days after a project's last logged event date
Warn offset days (integer): show warning on My Projects page this many days before the inactivity threshold (i.e. use 0 for no warning)
Ignore list: skip these projects, i.e. these projects will not be marked complete automatically
